Sentence: Krogstad, a low-level employee at the bank where Torvald works, arrives and proceeds into Torvald's study
(Krogstad)', 'Once he (Torvald) has finished meeting with Krogstad, Torvald comes into the living room and says that he (Torvald) can probably hire Mrs
Krogstad states that Torvald wants to fire him (Torvald) from his (Torvald) position at the bank and alludes to his (Torvald) own poor reputation
When she (Nora) refuses, Krogstad points out that he (Torvald) has in his (Torvald) possession a contract that contains Nora's forgery of her (Nora) father's signature
Krogstad blackmails Nora, threatening to reveal her (Nora) crime and to bring shame and disgrace on both Nora and her (Nora) husband if she (Nora) does not prevent Torvald from firing him (Torvald)
Krogstad leaves, and when Torvald returns, Nora tries to convince him (Torvald) not to fire Krogstad, but Torvald will hear nothing of it
He (Torvald) declares Krogstad an immoral man and states that he (Torvald) feels physically ill in the presence of such people
Torvald arrives, and Nora again begs him (Torvald) to keep Krogstad employed at the bank, but again Torvald refuses
When Nora presses him (Torvald), he (Torvald) admits that Krogstad's moral behavior isn't all that bothers him (Torvald)--he (Torvald) dislikes Krogstad's overly familiar attitude
Torvald and Nora argue until Torvald sends the maid to deliver Krogstad's letter of dismissal
Rank leaves, Krogstad arrives and demands an explanation for his (Torvald) dismissal
Linde instructs Nora to delay Torvald from opening the letter as long as possible while she (Nora) goes to speak with Krogstad
Linde soon returns and says that she (Nora) has left Krogstad a note but that he (Torvald) will be gone until the following evening
Krogstad is overjoyed and says he (man) will demand his (man) letter back before Torvald can read it and learn Nora's secret
Soon after Krogstad's departure, Nora and Torvald enter, back from the costume ball
She (Nora) then insists that Torvald read Krogstad's letter
Torvald opens it and discovers that Krogstad has returned Nora's contract -LRB-which contains the forged signature-RRB-
